concept.title: Assignments
concept.abstract: Staff users can segment subscribers via Assignments in order to identify and analyze levels of customer engagement.

conbody.p: Staff users must assign assignments when purchasing a subscription item via the Sales Order Line. Assignments for Subscriptions is necessary to identify the beneficiary of a subscription and to provide the beneficiary's contact information. The Assignment record will not detail the actual purchaser of the subscription. Instead, users must navigate to the Sales Order record to identify the contact purchasing the subscription.
